channel.title: --Prometheus 317--
channel.description:
[center][url=http://prometheus-rsps.net][img]http://prometheus-rsps.net/new-img/lol.png[/img][/url]
First of all i want the old topic by nate to be closed, this is our official advertisement.
Website: [url=http://prometheus-rsps.net]http://prometheus-rsps.net/webclient[/url]
Webclient: [url=http://prometheus-rsps.net/webclient/webclient.html]http://prometheus-rsps.net/webclient/webclient.html[/url]
Owners: Lardain, Qeruina.
There moparians, finally I`m happy to say that Promethius 317 is up and running 24/7. Our server strives for making the server the people like. With our slower exp rates on skills the highcores actually mean somehting. Combat i just perfect. Not to fast not to slow. We are a team with a coder with 5 years of experience.
What our server has?
100% staking. Old school game frame. Custom whip. Barrows on hills. Spirit shields. Npc clipping, clipped folowing. Vote for points. Highcores matching the website layout. Bank pins for optimal safety of your items. All items are acces able for F2P aswell, wich mean not Pay2Win. Updates from suggests, we listen to our players. A friendly staff. All skills working. Double experience weekends. Now for some pictures.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/POKDjfN.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Org6Qdy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Iq5X4GR.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nFRFAHp.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bFzj4UY.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cswOKVt.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Fvr4oHC.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: --Prometheus 317--

item.description:
@lardain wrote:

[center]

First of all i want the old topic by nate to be closed, this is our official advertisement.

http://prometheus-rsps.net/webclient/webclient.html

Owners: Lardain, Qeruina.

There moparians, finally I`m happy to say that Promethius 317 is up and running 24/7.
Our server strives for making the server the people like. With our slower exp rates on skills the highcores actually mean somehting. Combat i just perfect. Not to fast not to slow.
We are a team with a coder with 5 years of experience.

What our server has?

100% staking.
Old school game frame.
Custom whip.
Barrows on hills.
Spirit shields.
Npc clipping, clipped folowing.
Vote for points.
Highcores matching the website layout.
Bank pins for optimal safety of your items.
All items are acces able for F2P aswell, wich mean not Pay2Win.
Updates from suggests, we listen to our players.
A friendly staff.
All skills working.
Double experience weekends.
Now for some pictures.
